short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block tempting sites and stay focused!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash your productivity with our new Chrome extension, HyperFocus! Say goodbye to distractions and hello to focus with our simple yet powerful tool. 

HyperFocus blocks non-productive websites and helps you stay focused on your work. With just one click, you can block websites that waste your time, so you can be more productive and get more done. 

Try it now and see the difference for yourself! 💯💯

✩ HyperFocus ✩

📵 Overcome web addiction
🔋 Stay focused
🛡 Reduce distraction
💯 Boost productivity
🧠 Be more mindful
💪 Stop wasting time

✩ Key Features ✩

😌 Minimalistic interface & Easy access 
🚫 Block entire sites with domain name
🆓 Does not contain any ads, Block unlimited sites, free!
🔒 Does not collects any kind of data, 100% safe!

✩ Help or Feedback ✩

📮 help.hyperfocus@gmail.com
🌐 www.hyperfocus.co.in

Thank you for using HyperFocus, Have an awesome day! 🤩
